channel.title: CVE Feed for HitPay Payment Solutions Pte Ltd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HitPay Payment Solutions Pte Ltd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38747|2024-08-13T13:27:31.701Z -- hitpay%20payment%20solutions%20pte%20ltd -- hitpay%20payment%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in HitPay Payment Solutions Pte Ltd HitPay Payment Gateway for WooCommerce allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects HitPay Payment Gateway for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.1.3.
